snippet.title: BubbleByte 🫧🐱 |  Steam Release Trailer 🚀
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3499760/BubbleByte

BubbleByte is a unique blend of incremental clicker and tower defense, all about popping an endless stream of bubbles! 🫧 Unleash satisfying click combos, or automate your empire by recruiting adorable cats! 🐱

BubbleByte Discord: 
- https://discord.me/bubblebyte

---

https://vittorioromeo.com
